tool.name: MACS2 bdgbroadcall
tool.description: Call broad peaks from bedGraph output

param.name: cutoffpeak
param.label: Cutoff for peaks
param.help: depending on which method you used for score track. If the file contains qvalue scores from MACS2, score 2 means qvalue 0.01. DEFAULT: 2.0 (--cutoff-peak)

param.name: cutofflink
param.label: Cutoff for peaks
param.help: Cutoff for linking regions/low abundance regions depending on which method you used for score track. If the file contains qvalue scores from MACS2, score 1 means qvalue 0.1, and score 0.3 means qvalue 0.5. DEFAULT: 1 (--cutoff-link)

param.name: minlen
param.label: Minimum length of peak
param.help: better to set it as d value

param.name: LVL1MAXGAP
param.label: Maximum gap between significant peaks
param.help: better to set it as tag size

param.name: LVL2MAXGAP
param.label: Maximum linking between significant peaks
param.help: better to set it as 4 times of d value
